ygData.subject: Re: More CF Stuff
ygData.msgSnippet: Jer, did you ever reply to Grimmler? ... I ... and ... two ... another ... charge ... fires

Jer, did you ever reply to Grimmler?



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Jen told me that the Element's shields let Maximals pass through, so
I
> don't think this is a mode.
> 
> ::Prowl/Firearm/Scyther/Grimmler/Kluster/Reptilica/Demise::
> 
> Prowl lands near the Element, entering it and brushing past Mantle
and
> Epyon. He knew the basic layout of the ship, so he had no trouble
> getting to the CR chambers and getting Groove and Streetwise into
two
> of them. He turns around and exits the Element, flying toward
another
> group of Maximals.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Grimmler lands near the group of injured Maximals, but a stray laser
> blast sends him down to the ground. He jumps back up, looking around
> and spotting Headstrong fighting Firedrill. Assiming that Headstrong
> had fired at him, he runs toward the Decepticon, discarding his
> missile launcher (out of missiles), and taking out a pistol, firing
> four shots at Headstrong's head.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Kluster reaches the group of stasis-locked Maximals, taking Ratchet
> and Orion and jogging toward the Element.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Scyther smiles, watching EndBringer attacking Double Punch. He then
> takes aim and fires two charges at Injector, and puts away his
charge
> launcher, with was out of ammo.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Firearm watches another tank begin to help him out (Forrior). He
fires
> two missiles, both of them heading for Predator (not seeking, of
> course).
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Reptilica recieves Zardus's orders, and fires two missiles down at
> Vehement, flying down toward the big bot.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Demise stands up, rubbing his head but then running at Injector
> without wasting any time.
